Text: When Dev Mode is enabled, automatically finishing the building when placing a building while holding Ctrl would place the building normally for construction.
Do not clear Dev Mode filter.
Do not clear the Dev Mode filter when invoking one or adding/removing them from favorites.
Click Refresh to select a mod thumbnail if the 'Pick upload thumbnail' option is checked.
Pick a thumbnail for your upload instead of using thumbnail.png.
Always open with an external browser instead of the Steam overlay browser.
Enable DevMode by default when loading the game.

Move to top moves the mod to the top but below their dependencies. Reset Load Order sorts mods by enabling, name, then brings their dependencies right on top. Enabled mods are shown first when uploading.
Do not save the game when exiting.
Enable quick quit when pressing [Ctrl Shift Q]. This option uses Process.Kill() so no save will be made.
Enable quick restart when pressing [Ctrl Shift R]. This option uses Process.Kill() so no save will be made.
